tool_description: The easiest way to extract EXIF metadata from photos!
name: AirExif
title: AirExif

api_list.name: Extract EXIF metadata from photo URL
api_list.description: Returns EXIF metadata for a given photo URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airexif2.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exif/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airexif2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airexif2.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exif/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airexif2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
